meet-together.headline-p1: Find the best time slot for everyone,
meet-together.name: Name
meet-together.no_plans_yet: You don't have any plans yet.
meet-together.new_plan_desc: This plan will help you find the best time to meet together with your friends, family, or colleagues.
meet-together.dates_required: Please select at least one date
meet-together.cant_create_plan_right_now: We can't create your plan right now. Please try again later.
meet-together.login_to_save_plans: Sign up or login into Tuturuuu to save your created plans.

meet-together-plan-details.mail_p2: I'm setting up a meet-together plan for us to help figure out when we're all available for
meet-together-plan-details.mail_p4: to add your availability and make it easier for everyone to meet together. Thank you
meet-together-plan-details.identity_protection_desc: Use a guest account and optionally set a password for this plan to protect your identity.
meet-together-plan-details.account_switcher_desc: Interact with this plan using a guest account, or use a Tuturuuu account with more advanced features.
meet-together-plan-details.your_name_desc: This is how others will see you in this plan.
meet-together-plan-details.password_desc: Prevent others from using your name in this plan without your permission.
meet-together-plan-details.name: Name
meet-together-plan-details.update_plan_desc: This plan will help you find the best time to meet together with your friends, family, or colleagues.
meet-together-plan-details.cant_update_plan_right_now: We can't update your plan right now. Please try again later.
meet-together-plan-details.cant_delete_plan_right_now: We can't delete your plan right now. Please try again later.
meet-together-plan-details.delete_plan_warning: This action cannot be undone. The plan and all related information will be permanently deleted from Tuturuuu.
meet-together-plan-details.qr_code_description: Scan this QR code to quickly access the meet together plan details.
meet-together-plan-details.save_credentials_desc: Automatically log in when you return to this plan
